name: ig-wikipedia_ig_all_maxi
title: Wikipedia na Igbo
description: Nchikọta edemede gbasara nkwalite ahụ ike di na Wikipedia nke asụsụ Igbo na usoro nke ga eme ka achọta ya ọsisọ ma hara iji ntanet. Imerime nkea bụ nke onye ọbụla nwere ike iwere na akwụghi ụgwọ, ya bụ na inwere ike were ya, jiri ya me ihe ichọro, kekwa ya ma bulite ya elu. Biko soro anyi ka anyi mee ka ndi nke na abia makaria nkea.
